title: I've been punished twice now for having a connection error and reconnecting
body: So basically the automatic leaver buster is picking up on me alt f4ing a game to reconnect as me afking. I've been punished now twice in a row for having to do this across multiple games. This usually happens if, for example, I have a blackout one day, then another game I cannot move when I start playing and so I leave the game and try reconnect. One such game as Nasus I had to leave and rejoin multiple times to get it to work. Recently my sister unplugged my internet connection (accidentally) (Or so she says) and after reconnecting and winning the game I was found with a leaver buster penalty again. ): Can I appeal these at all?

replies.body: No appeal. Stop being a dick and disconnecting.
Its not like I can control it when that happens. How is accidental disconnection correlated to being a dick?
